name: Ashface
description:
You play as Douglas “Ashface” McCane, a serial killer located in a small forest, and your goal is to kill all invaders of the forest by dawn, using your trusty, bloody axe.

Your axe has many uses:

  • Can be swung (LMB) to one-hit kill an invader
  • Can be thrown (RMB) to hit and possess an invader then cause them to explode (LMB)
  • Swinging while in a campfire and looking at another campfire causes Ashface to teleport from one campfire to another
